All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Budget
Budget implementation of FinancialEntity interface
BudgetManager
Class for managing user budgets
Expense
Class representing expense transactions Extends the abstract Transaction class
FinancialEntity
Interface for financial entities (requirement 7 - Interface)
FinancialUtility
Utility class with generic methods for financial operations Demonstrates use of generics (requirement 19)
FinancialUtility.AmountFilter
Example filter implementation for transactions by amount
FinancialUtility.DateFilter
Example filter implementation for transactions by date
FinancialUtility.Filter<T>
Generic filter interface Part of generics implementation (requirement 19)
Income
Class representing income transactions Extends the abstract Transaction class
InsufficientFundsException
Exception for insufficient funds
InvalidAmountException
Exception for invalid transaction amounts
InvalidCategoryException
Exception for invalid category
Main
Main class for the Finance Tracker application.
ReportGenerator
Class for generating financial reports Uses Java library classes (requirement 21)
SavingsGoal
SavingsGoal implementation of FinancialEntity interface
Transaction
Abstract class representing a financial transaction Serves as a base class for Income and Expense (requirement 8 - Abstract Class)
TransactionManager
Class for managing user transactions Uses ArrayList and Stack data structures
User
Represents a user of the Finance Tracker application.
